document_data.mainbody:
Maestro Zalan was a fencing teacher of Lyrabar in Impiltur in the late 14 century DR.
After Taegan Nightwinds academy was burned down by the Cult of the Dragon in the , he immediately began talking to Stedd, Taegans provost, despite it being very early in the morning of Ches 13. The avariel suspected that Zalan was attempting to hire Stedd to be his provost, and thought that the latter might have to disclose their secrets he briefly considered issuing a challenge to Zalan, but was talked out of it by Corkaury Mindle.
